title: "are you sure you want to cancel league of legends installation" Help please !
body: So basicly my friend wanted to install League of Legends and everytime he tries to whenever it finishes the download (which takes like 5 sec) he gets an error type thing that appears saying "are you sure you want to cancel league of legends installation" It has 2 choices "Yes" and "No" if he presses anyone of these it restarts the installation and does the same thing again.... Would be awesome if someone would help :3

replies.body: What OS is your friend on, is it on Vista?  If so, ask him to make sure it is updated to Service Pack 2.  Otherwise, there might be other issues with his OS or hardware that's causing this problem.  Let me know if that solves the installation issue!

He is on Windows 7 Professional and he has some more problems with downloading and opening certain programs, but he said that all he needs is to install League of Legends. Also how does one "Update it to service pack 2" ? I'm not really experienced with this type of stuff :/

Service pack 2 is like an old content patch for a previous version of Windows.  For windows 7, ask him to make sure that the[ OS is updated](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=49540) to the most current version to ensure he has all necessary products to install league.  If he continues to have issues, then there may be a hardware issue, but I rather rule out other possibilities first.  Hopefully, updating his windows will help!

So he tried to install the update and all he got is the error "the service cannot be started, either because it is disabled or because it has no enabled devices associated with it" Which he has been getting for a bunch of programs and games downloaded from the internet :/
Thank you so much, i'll try to help him when he's on. Didn't think a Riot member will reply :D Have a nice day :3
